description: S4: Since completing your residency, how many years have you practiced medicine?
S10r1c1: Direct patient care - Approximately what percentage of your time is spent on each of the following?
S10r2c1: Teaching - Approximately what percentage of your time is spent on each of the following?
S10r3c1: Research and/or clinical trials - Approximately what percentage of your time is spent on each of the following?
S10r4c1: Administration / Other - Approximately what percentage of your time is spent on each of the following?
S11r1c1: Chronic Kidney Disease - Approximately, how many patients have you personally managed for each of the following conditions in the past 12 months?
S11r2c1: Polycystic Kidney Disease - Approximately, how many patients have you personally managed for each of the following conditions in the past 12 months?
S11r3c1: IgA Nephropathy - Approximately, how many patients have you personally managed for each of the following conditions in the past 12 months?
S11r4c1: C3G - Approximately, how many patients have you personally managed for each of the following conditions in the past 12 months?
S12: Of the IgA Nephropathy patients currently under your care, how many are actively being treated?
S12a: Of the C3G patients currently under your care, how many are actively being treated?

C4a: Approximately how many hours per week do you spend obtaining coverage for medication for your patients?

D2: In a typical week, approximately how many individual representatives do you see from pharmaceutical companies? Please think only about those representatives with whom you have some type of interaction, whether it is signing for samples or discussing a
